definitions.title: vb. Pi.
definitions.body: be exhausted, faint (Targum [[פְּגַר]] der. spec. tear down, destroy; As. pagru, body, corpse; NH [[פֶּגֶר]] = BH; Aram. [[פַּגְרָא]], ; Palm. [[פגר]]; Mand. [[פאגרא]] Nö:M § 89);—Pf. 3 pl. [[פִּגְּרוּ מִן]] they were too faint to go, etc. 1Sa 30:10, 1Sa 30:21.
